alert.note: Alert for Itawamba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Itawamba County through 200 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sandy Springs, or 10 miles north of Fulton, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Mantachie, Tremont, Fairview, Sandy Springs, Clay, Eastman, Bounds Crossroads, Dorsey, Ballardsville and Kirkville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
